quote: Cycling, cycling forever bear, wolf, caribou.When had it all started, where will it end?We are all part of one, from such simple beginnings and yet all so different.Yet one.One and again.
quote_letters: CYCLING CYCLING FOREVER BEAR WOLF CARIBOUWHEN HAD IT ALL STARTED WHERE WILL IT ENDWE ARE ALL PART OF ONE FROM SUCH SIMPLE BEGINNINGS AND YET ALL SO DIFFERENTYET ONEONE AND AGAIN
